content.raw:
The sensors are being picked up from the SDF files hosted on https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/models . For the competition, teams are only allowed to use the provided configurations, as described on [this wiki page](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots).

If you want to use different models with SubT, you'll need to upload your custom models to the Ignition Fuel website, or modify the SDF files after they're downloaded to your computer. You can find them in `~/.ignition/fuel`.
content.html:
The sensors are being picked up from the SDF files hosted on https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/models . For the competition, teams are only allowed to use the provided configurations, as described on this wiki page.

If you want to use different models with SubT, you'll need to upload your custom models to the Ignition Fuel website, or modify the SDF files after they're downloaded to your computer. You can find them in ~/.ignition/fuel.
